summary: SummaryBaBylissPRO Nano Titanium Portofino 2000-watt Italian motor Dryer is enhanced with Nano Titanium technology to distribute heat evenly for optimal results.
details: DetailsFeaturesPowerful long-life Italian AC MotorNano Titanium heat technologyTrue Ionic Generator6 heat/speed settingsCold Shot buttonRemovable stainless steel filter2 ultra-thin concentrator nozzles9 ft cordLimited 4 year manufacturer warrantyBenefits2000 watts for faster dryingNano Titanium technology generates gentle, even heat for exceptionally shiny locksIons reduced frizz and static leaving hair shiny, smooth and silkyGreat for all hair types including thick & coarse hair, this blow dryer helps reveal shiny, healthy-looking hairDisclaimersPackaging may varyItem 2525654

reviews.headline: Best dryer ever
reviews.comments: Love this dryer for my unruly hair

reviews.headline: great blowdryer
reviews.comments: Great blower dryer, love the size, great for everday and travel.

reviews.headline: Best Dryer Around, 5 Stars
reviews.comments: This is actually the second time I've purchased this dryer. My last one lasted me 6 years, and that's with every day use. When my previous dryer finally died on me, I was super bummed. I was so surprised when this same model was available, I immediately snatched it up! I love the different heat levels, love the cooling feature, superior air flow, it really is the perfect dryer. Especially for the price point. HIGHLY recommend!

reviews.headline: worth buying
reviews.comments: A very nice hairdryer.  The type and placement of the buttons are perfect, but I wish the nozzle attachments were magnetic or easier to turn.

reviews.headline: Fantastic
reviews.comments: You can  feel  the difference  great  product

reviews.headline: Blew out after 7 months
reviews.comments: Thsi dryer is great when it works, bur it blew out after 7 months of use.  It was used 2-3 times per week for about 10-15 minutes each time.

reviews.headline: Died on me twice.
reviews.comments: Two of these blow dryers died on me on two separate occasions. The first one died while I was out of state on vaca - I thought, well, maybe it was an issue with outlet in the rental house. I generally liked how this dryer performed so I shelled out for another one. The new one lasted 2 years before dying, at home, in my modern apartment where I know the outlets are not the issue. Ridiculous to pay this much for something untrustworthy.

reviews.headline: I own one for more than 15 years I think??
reviews.comments: Get this BEAST of a blow dryer and you'll thank me later. No cons here but the weight/size. But it's because it has a Ferarri motor!!

reviews.headline: Stopped working in less than a year of use
reviews.comments: I purchased this last August, less than a year ago. I use it probably once a month, twice tops - so since last August I've used this product under 20 times. It stopped working last week. For a dryer of this price to break in under a year is ridiculous. While I did like it better than the cheaper Conair dryer I used to use, it's not justifiable at this price point, especially considering my cheap Conair dryer lasted 5 years while this didn't even last one. I've used BabyLiss for straighteners as well, which seem to hold up just fine, but I would not recommend their dryers.

reviews.headline: Chord for miles
reviews.comments: I absolutely love this hair dryer. My only complaint is that the chord is like 10 feet long snd it's a thick chord so you can't wrap it up for storage. I fight it every time I put it away, lol. Other than that, works great.

reviews.headline: Nice quality
reviews.comments: Great value

reviews.headline: Great hair dryer!
reviews.comments: This dryer is great! It dries quickly and leaves my hair shiny and soft. I ordered during a promotion and got the travel size dryer free. It's the perfect travel size and has good power.

reviews.headline: Fool me twice...
reviews.comments: I've owned two of these dryers over the last five years. My second one, bought in May 2022 just stopped getting hot and now only blows warm air. It takes FOREVER to dry my hair now and I can't use it. Will be buying another brand moving forward.

reviews.headline: I am loving my hair again!!
reviews.comments: Bear with me while I ramble onâ€¦about 5 years ago I switched from this dryer after many many years when it stopped heating properly. I tried the Dyson Supersonic for a few years until it stopped working and I never liked how my hair looked while using it. I figured that the reason I disliked how my hair looked was due to my aging hair (I'm 62 with a lot of hair that is also frizzy and wavy, in a butterfly cut) along with my chosen round brush and products. I use Aveda haircare products. I even tried the SRI DryQ dryer for about 10 months til that stopped working. I decided to give this dryer another try after researching dryers and reviews and I am so happy I did!! I love my hair again!!! Same products, same round brush and technique. With this dryer, my hair is smooth, soft, shiny and straight and dried so quickly. I will never switch to a different dryer again. This is the one! And I no longer have to plan around freshly washed and styled hair days, since it now looks great on day1 not having to wait for that 2nd/3rd day good hair day.

reviews.headline: I recommend this dryer
reviews.comments: I liked the dryer, although I already have a good one, I wanted a more modern dryer and this one has more technology. It dries very quickly, is light and not noisy, over time I wonder if it really protects the hair from heating, it seems like it does

reviews.headline: Best I've Found
reviews.comments: Works so well

reviews.headline: Good investment!
reviews.comments: This was recommended by someone who does amazing blowouts. I am so glad I purchased it. It heats up great and cuts down my drying time. The attachments are sturdy, doesnt feel cheap. I've had it for almost a year and it still works just as good as when I first bought it.

reviews.headline: Hot and fast
reviews.comments: I needed a hairdryer that was really hot and powerful for my curly hair.  This definitely was better than my expectations.

reviews.headline: Died after a year
reviews.comments: Died after a year of use.  So disappointed.  My much cheaper one lasted almost 20 years.

reviews.headline: Disappointed
reviews.comments: Very disappointed in this blow dryer. I was hoping the investment would be worth it, but every time i use it i end up with tangled knots in my hair.

media.headline: Salon blowout at home with amazing dryer price on point.
Salon blowout at home with amazing dryer price on point.

faceoff_positive.comments:
I am happy I chose this dryer! I had a different brand but high end dryer from a major beauty supply shop that lasted me 7 years. I was overwhelmed when that one broke and I needed to find a replacement. There are so many on the market now! Since I know the difference in quality of hair appliances DOES make the hair healthier and save time, I decided to go a step higher in the hairdryer options this time. I initially bought a T3. Not a bad dryer but I didn't see the $200 difference. I read that brand's reviews to find it had durability and warranty issues so I returned it. On to the next option...

The 'salon' I go to is a high end beauty school. They not only sell Babyliss appliances but all the students are taught with their entry level model dryer. I saw this one on special with much better reviews so I gave it a try. I picked this one over their other model with a Ferrari motor, no joke! A new Ulta store has a tester section for hair appliances in their store and compared to even more expensive dryers, it seems the most powerful and easy to use of Ulta's dryer choices. 

All I can say is I am pleased! Money well spent and my hair looks great in top drytime speed, even a couple days after initially styling. And I can forgo the 'secondary' appliance styling--that is the real test! I hope this one lives up to its durability because it is a great dryer worth every single penny.

One note is that the diffusers could fit a bit more snug. Not an issue to affect the quality but I am rough on my equipment and like to store mine in the drawer ready for use and it might come off or loosen more than I'd like.
faceoff_positive.headline: Great Time Saver and Hair Looks Great

faceoff_negative.comments: I bought the blue Nano Titanium hair dryer, model BNTB6610N about three weeks ago. I have used it less than two weeks and it is already falling apart. I unpacked it from my suitcase and saw the rear filter screen is missing. The plastic frame is still attached to the dryer but the filter screen is gone and I have no idea where it is. This is a huge disappointment to me because I have never paid so much money for a hair dryer before and I really do love the power of it and how my hair looks afterward. Even though I have taken very good care of this dryer and it is almost brand new, I would even be willing to buy a replacement rear filter, but there is no replacement filter for this model on the Babyliss website. Needless to say, I am extremely disappointed that I spent so much money on a hair dryer and it is already falling apart.
faceoff_negative.headline: Huge Disappointment!!
